description:
Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door is a quirky, turn-based RPG with a paper-craft twist.
Mario teams up with oddball allies to stop an ancient evil sealed behind a magical door.
Set in Rogueport, the game mixes platforming, puzzles, and witty, self-aware dialogue.
Battles play out on a stage with timed button presses and a live audience cheering you on.
game: Paper Mario The Thousand Year Door

v0.1.1.title: TTYD AP v0.1.1

v0.2.0.description:
Additions:
3 new yaml options. LimitChapterLogic, LimitChapterEight, and PalaceSkip
LimitChapterLogic: Chapters needing to be completed are determined during generation. Any chapters not required to beat the game will contain only junk items belonging to you.
LimitChapterEight: Chapter 8 will only contain junk items belonging to you. All chapter 8 key items are force placed into their vanilla locations.
PalaceSkip: Entering the thousand year door will take you straight to the room before Grodus.

BUGFIXES:
-Various client bugs and apworld logic errors
-Fix for not being able to go to the moon more than 1 time
-Fix for ch.7 progress being reverted if you talked to goldbob in poshley heights after going to the moon.
-Fix for metal door in ch.5 reappearing after being opened
-Fix for game crashing when talking to the mover in ch.2
-Fix for yoshi check being triggerable twice in ch.3
-Fix for cutscene error in grubbas office if you came in from the storage room before becoming a fighter.
-Fix for issues in ch.6 regarding the bowser intermission.
-Fix for jolene cutscene in ch.3 hallway playing when it shouldnt
-Fix for NpcnameToPtr errors in ch.3 related to the yoshi egg
-Fix for being softlocked in ch.3 if you warped out of the locker room while the champion fight was reserved.
-Fix for game giving you partners for free in ch.3
-Fix for 2 ships being in the rogueport docks if you beat ch.5 without ever sailing there,
-Fix for entrance to Black Chest room in ch.1 teleporting you to the other side
-Fix for doopliss event being missing in twilight trail if you warped out too early
-Fix for the coconuts in ch.5 crashing when picking them up twice.
-Fix for crash during some cutscenes if you did not have a partner/follower out.
-Fix for SP bar not updating properly
-Fix for losing maximum SP if you beat an earlier chapter than you already had done.
-Various other small mod bugs and issues.


DISCLAIMER: This apworld contains a derivative work licensed under GPL-3.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/compare/v0.1.1...v0.2.0
v0.2.0.title: TTYD AP v0.2.0

v0.3.0r2.description:
CHANGELOG:
ADDED: New yaml options: OpenWestide, PermanentPeekaboo, DisableIntermissions, StartingHP, StartingFP, StartingBP
UPDATED: Warping to Rogueport now requires the use of a Warp Pipe. You can find it in your important items tab.
UPDATED: Various logic fixes across multiple chapters
UPDATED: Added some small additions for use of the Poptracker
UPDATED: Various QoL across the game mod
UPDATED: Extra items received will try to go into storage before getting voided out
FIXED: Issue where grodus would be missing if PalaceSkip was enabled
FIXED: Issue where generating with certain games with Generic Entrance Rando would fail generation
FIXED: Fixed extra gclib dependency for the generator. It is only required now for the patcher.
FIXED: Issues with receiving items from the client after connecting with a queue of items
FIXED: Various in-game issues and incorrect sequences

DISCLAIMER: This apworld contains a derivative work licensed under GPL-3.

## What's Changed
* Update setup_en.md by @earthor1 in https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/pull/1
* Added send_msgs command to write the player's current ROOM to datastorage. by @PillarAngel in https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/pull/3
* Fixed incorrect current_room variable name (from ctx.current_room). by @PillarAngel in https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/pull/5
* Looking to have options added to the slot_data by @earthor1 in https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/pull/6
* Fixed client crash when connecting to games with a password. by @PillarAngel in https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/pull/7

## New Contributors
* @earthor1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/pull/1
* @PillarAngel made their first contribution in https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/pull/3

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0
v0.3.0r2.title: TTYD AP v0.3.0

FIXED: Blanket, Ragged Diary, and Vital Paper were not properly checked before turning them in

DISCLAIMER: This apworld contains a derivative work licensed under GPL-3.

v0.3.2.description:
CHANGELOG:
ADDED: New yaml option: FullRunBar. The green bar when running away will always be at 100%
UPDATED: Small logic update for ch.2
UPDATED: Warp pipe is now first always first in the sort order
UPDATED: Return pipe will be given to players if they are playing on v0.2.0
FIXED: Issue where the game would crash when collecting any crystal star
FIXED: Issue where Ragged Diary check would not be sent out in the client correctly
FIXED: Sometimes a cutscene where flurrie shouts about her neckalce would play infinitely
FIXED: StartingHP and StartingFP would not be set correctly

DISCLAIMER: This apworld contains a derivative work licensed under GPL-3.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/compare/v0.3.1...v0.3.2
v0.3.2.title: TTYD AP v0.3.2

v0.4.0.description:
ADDED: Tattlesanity. Use goombella to tattle enemies and get items. Any item in the game can be behind tattling an enemy.
ADDED: FastTravel. Use the Map in the main menu to warp to any area you have been to before
ADDED: Grubba bribes. You can talk to grubba in his office at any point after the Goomba fight to pay him to raise or lower your rank.
ADDED: AlwaysSucceedConditions. Enabling this will make it so grubba's fight condition is always filfilled regardless of if you did so or not.
ADDED: Required stars are now shown on the thousand year door underneath rogueport
CHANGED: Return pipe sprite has been temporarily changed until I can find a permanent replacement.
CHANGED: Post-Ch.2 checks are available as soon as the chapter is beaten, instead of after leaving the great tree.
CHANGED: Tattles in the bucket in frankley's office now appears right away as opposed to at the end of the respective chapter.
FIXED: Various issues with generation and logic.
FIXED: Various client improvements and fixes
FIXED: You could find the same parter you started with in the world as an item.
FIXED: You could find multiple cookbooks in your world
FIXED: Issue when leaving the ship after fighting cortex with intermissions disabled
FIXED: Elevator would not work in the X-Naut base after Magnus 2.0
FIXED: Various other small fixes and QoL

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/compare/v0.3.2...v0.4.0
v0.4.0.title: TTYD AP v0.4.0

v0.4.0-HOTFIX.description:
FIXED: Yoshi color being set to white would cause lots of graphical issues
CHANGED: Feedback added to client when the seed is verified

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/compare/v0.4.0...v0.4.0-HOTFIX
v0.4.0-HOTFIX.title: TTYD AP v0.4.0-HOTFIX

v0.5.0.description:
# Changelog
## New Features
- New Goal: Crystal Stars. Collect x amount of crystal stars to goal.
- New Feature: The door to the palace of shadow now has its own setting to determine how many stars are required to open it.
- New Goal: Bonetail. Defeat bonetail at the end of the pit of 100 trials to goal.
- New Mod Feature: Pit Checkpoints. Unlock a checkpoint every 10 floors of the pit. Get access to these checkpoints by talking to the sign in front of the entrance pipe to the pit.
- New Settings: Exp Modifier, Starting Level, Skip Cutscenes. Note: The currently skippable cutscenes are the Ch.7 Cannon cutscene, Ch.5 boat sequence, and Shadow queen fight cutscenes.
## Misc. Changes
- All badge pruchase prices and sell prices have been updated. Sell price is always half of the buy price.
- Some item names have been changed for clarity on what they are for, and to fix grammer.
- Some missable enemies have been added to the trash can in frankleys house, and some tattles were given extra logic to account for showing up in multiple chapters.
- Updated the color of the HP bar under enemies in battle if they are tattled to be green.
## Bugfixes
- Fixed issue where the pre-fill step of a TTYD slot would take longer depending on the size of the multiworld.
- Fixed issue where tattling an enemy with tattlesanity enabled could crash the game.
- Fixed issue where flurries house could be reached early with the map warp feature.
- Fixed issue where dubious paper in Ch.3 could be grabbed infinitely with the warp feature.
- Fixed issue where even when losing the fight in Ch.3, you would succeed the condition of the fight with the Always Succeed Condtions setting on.
- Fixed issue where the Station Key check in Riverside could be permanently missable if the door to Riverside was unlocked first.
- Fixed issue where general white could be woken up before talking to the mayor with bobbery.
- Fixed issue in Ch.7 where the moving walkway in the factory room would move the player even if it was off.
- Fixed issue where some side bosses would appear in the trash can immediateley if they were beaten even if they didnt have goombella.
- Other various small changes to the apworld and mod.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0
v0.5.0.title: TTYD AP v0.5.0

v0.5.1.description:
# Changelog

## New Features
- Deathlink

## Misc. Changes
- gclib is no longer required to be installed to patch your game. Any gclib installed for TTYD can be safely removed from the lib folder.
- Sleepy Stomp and Attack FX B have been added to the item pool
- All badges have been marked as useful items. Gold bars, Whacka Bump, and star pieces have also been marked as useful items.
- Pit set to vanilla will now have the locations enabled with the vanilla items force locked in the locations.
- Whacka bump sell price has been reduced
- Lucky Lottery check in west rogueport has been renamed for clarity

## Bug Fixes
- Old letter is now properly required to progress the Ch.5 sequence
- Fixed crash in Ch.7 when taking the cannon
- Fixed softlock when warping in paper mode
- Fixed multiple generation issues related to the new goals and limit chapter logic


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1
v0.5.1.title: TTYD AP v0.5.1

v0.5.2.description:
# v0.5.2 Changelog

# Note
All games and yamls generated with an older apworld will no longer be compatible starting with 0.5.2. Future updates will continue to provide compatibility with old updates, starting from this one.

## New Features
- New Yaml Options: MusicSettings, BlockVisibility, and ZeroBPFirstAttack.
- MusicSettings: Choose between vanilla music, randomized music, and no music at all.
- BlockVisibility: This lets you turn hidden blocks into visible ones.
- ZeroBPFIrstAttack: As the name implies, the badge First Attack will cost 0 BP.
- All shop items will now show the player name and item name for that player if it belongs to another someone other than yourself.
- New fast travel points have been added to the riddle tower and the excess express.
- Some new Misc. items have been added to the item pool, and most item frequencies have been tweaked.

## Misc. Changes
- Goombella will now be a useful item with tattlesanity off.
- Various items have had their grammer and descriptions updated
- Various textboxes have been updated
- All keys have had their in-game names updated to match the apworld
- Yoshi sprites in-game will now be the appropriate color
- Stage level is now updated properly with the starting level yaml option



## Bug Fixes
- Entering the rogueport docks will no longer have overlapping ships after beating ch.5


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/compare/v0.5.1...v0.5.2
v0.5.2.title: TTYD AP v0.5.2

v0.5.3.description:
# v0.5.3 Changelog

## Misc. Changes
- Shop item descriptions are now color coded based on item classification
- Shop prices have been tweaked for newly added items in 0.5.2
- Item block in room 1 of twilight trail in the shed has been moved to prevent an item getting stuck on the roof
- Logic tweaked for a few items in hooktails castle, removing paper mode from them

## Bug Fixes
- Fixed No messages english error with all partner items
- Fixed issue with typo in 'Mini Mr. Mini'
- Fixed numerous issues with block visibility option, including invalid items, block being visible when the setting was disabled, and graphical issues/memory corruption
- Fixed textbox issue with shopkeep in twilight town
- Fixed goal_stars yaml option from having a minimum value of 1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/compare/v0.5.2...v0.5.3
v0.5.3.title: TTYD AP v0.5.3

v0.6.0.description:
# Changelog

## New Features
- New Settings: Piecesanity, Shopsanity, Shinesanity, and StarShuffle. Added sanity options for certain checks to customize what you can randomize. This does not add any new checks. StarShuffle allows you to shuffle crystal stars into the item pool as normal items.

## Settings Changes
- random_partner and random_color have been removed. You can add random as an option to your yaml, or use settings weights to get the same effect. There is no partner or color bias when using random as an option.

## Mod Updates
- You will now be blocked from entering the throne room in the palace of shadows if you do not have the required amount of stars. Shadow Queen goal now uses goal_stars to determine how many stars are needed to reach grodus.
- Some small failsafes were added to chapter 2 in the case you did not get 101 punies in certain cases.
- Some fast travel points were tweaked.
- You will now properly be blocked from teleporting in chapter 5 if you just beat cortez and have not finished the intermission.
- Some small text fixes and flag changes related to items.

## Known Issues
- Getting a crystal star from don pianta causes some of the music to play incorrectly.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/compare/v0.5.3...v0.6.0
v0.6.0.title: TTYD AP v0.6.0

v0.6.1.description:
# Changelog

## Generation Changes
- Crystal stars will now follow LCL logic based on what chapter they are from.
- Pit items now check for chapter completions rather than crystal stars.
- Final staircase item in palace of shadow cannot have stars placed into them.
- Many pre-placed items are now properly removed from the item pool.

## Bugfixes
- Fixed issues related to star item collection. This includes getting crystal stars in chests and during certain events. This also includes things movement related when collecting a star.
- Fixed issue where you would not get a new star power when receiving a crystal star from another world.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1
v0.6.1.title: TTYD AP v0.6.1

v0.6.2.description:
# Changelog

## Generation fixes
- Fixed issues where certain items were not removed from the item pool after they were locked into a location. (Crystal Stars, Palace keys etc.)
- Fixed issue where some ch.2 checks would be in logic too early if you got an emerald star that was shuffled
- Fixed issue related to goal_stars and palace_stars if shadow_queen was the goal
- Other various generation changes and fixes

## Mod Fixes
- Fixed issue where certain items would not be obtainable after a vanilla crystal star location was obtained, random or not
- Players are now prevented from warping out of ch.2 during the escape sequence

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/compare/v0.6.1...v0.6.2
v0.6.2.title: TTYD AP v0.6.2

v0.7.0.description:
# Changelog

## Additions
- New Yaml Option: DazzleItems. All 15 of dazzle's items can be randomized, including settings for Any item or just filler items.
- UT Support. If you have Universal Tracker installed then the TTYD Client will have a tracker page built in from UT.

## Misc. Changes
- StarShuffle now supports shuffling stars between themselves, for random stars at the end of every chapter.
- Credits will now trigger with crystals_stars and bonetail as goal options, once the objective has been completed respectively.

## Bugfixes
- Fixed the second lock in the storage room in chapter 3 from opening too early without using the jey
- Fixed not being able to buy hot dogs from the hot dog seller during the yoshi egg sequence
- Fixed ch.3 cutscene playing during the epilogue if the chapter was never visited
- Fixed riddle tower warp point not being unlocked on first visit
- Fixed misc. issues with items not being obtainable after picking up a shuffled crystal star
- Fixed issue with blue switch in ch.2 pool room
- Fixed issue when generating on the website where players would crash in the ch.6 luggage cart
- Fixed issues with the red/blue cages in ch.2 if you opened both without reloading the room.
- Fixed various punio animations in the red/blue cage room
- Fixed ch.2 state if players entered the tree before continuing the flurries necklace sequence
- Fixed door in ch.5 that did not disappear correctly after hitting a blue switch
- Fixed item block in twilight trail being in the range of a doopliss cutscene
- Fixed issues with certain items containing non-filler items that should be only filler, due to LCL or other filler item options
- Fixed issues where items that should be removed from the pool were not removed after being locked in place


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/ArchipelagoTTYD/compare/v0.6.2...v0.7.0
v0.7.0.title: TTYD AP v0.7.0

v0.8.0.description:
# Changelog
- Add new yaml options: RequiredStarsToggle, RequiredStars, ShopPurchaseLimit, Keysanity, BluePipeToggle, GrubbaBribeDirection, GrubbaBribeCost
- RequiredStarsToggle and RequiredStars can be used to manually select which stars are logically required to enter the palace and goal as opposed to a random selection
- ShopPurchaseLimit allows you to select which types of items can be purchased infinitely in the shops, including badges and consumables.
- Keysanity allows you to pre-place keys in their own dungeons if disabled.
- BluePipeToggle allows you to disable the use of blue pipes in Rogueport Sewers, changing logic.
- GrubbaBribeDirection allows you to choose which ranks grubba charges you for to move up or down. Pay for 1 direction or the other, or both.
- GrubbaBribePrice lets you change how much each bribe rank will cost in coins, from 0 through 50
- Various cutscenes have been added to the CutsceneSkip setting
- Added a manifest for APv0.7.0 compatibility
- Patching will now fail starting with v0.8.0 if the versions of your apworld and patch mismatch
- Updated UT support compatibility
- Various client safeguards for goaling and sending out checks accidentally
- Updated location names for shops to better indicate they are in a shop
- Cleaned up ap item descriptions in shops

# Bugfixes
- Fixed various issues with items having progression items in them even though they should be filler or limited
- Fixed issues with tattlesanity locations not being limited
- Fixed issues related to star counts for the palace of shadow door
- Fix wrong warp in ch.2 after opening the front door to the great tree when leaving towards flurries house
- Fix door in ch.5 not disappearing after hitting a switch
- Fix issues with credits related to story flags
- Moved item block in Twilight trail out of a cutscene trigger
- Fix multiple crashes in chapter 2 related to puni's and punio being in the wrong positions during cutscenes
- Fix for getting an extra crytstal star in ch.4 during the first doopliss fight
- Fix for flavios boat still being in rogueport if ch.5 was already beaten
- Fix for vivian dissapearing in the second doopliss fight if she was your active partner
- Fix for crash in ch.6 when talking to the chef during the first mystery
- Fix for softlock in ch.6 if you had vivian as a follower when entering the shop
- Fix for bug in ch.8 where you could skip the dull bones fight for the first palace key
- Various other small fixes and changes to the apworld and mod
v0.8.0.title: TTYD AP v0.8.0
